request.title: Serial Parcel Schema
request.description: Serial profile parcel schema for POST request

interfaceName.description: Serial Interface Name - slot/subslot/port:channel-group for T1/E1, slot/subslot/port for NIM-1T

clockRate.description: Set preference for interface Clock speed

bandwidthDownstream.description: Interface downstream bandwidth capacity, in kbps

maxControlConnections.description: Set the maximum number of control connections for this TLOC

vbondAsStunServer.description: Put this wan interface in STUN mode only

excludeControllerGroupList.description: Exclude the following controller groups defined in this list

vmanageConnectionPreference.description: Set interface preference for control connection to vManage <0..8>

portHop.description: Disallow port hopping on the tunnel interface

lowBandwidthLink.description: Set the interface as a low-bandwidth circuit

tunnelTcpMssAdjust.description: Tunnel TCP MSS on SYN packets, in bytes

clearDontFragment.description: Enable clear dont fragment (Currently Only SDWAN Tunnel Interface)

networkBroadcast.description: Accept and respond to network-prefix-directed broadcasts)

bind.description: Bind loopback tunnel interface to a physical interface

natRefreshInterval.description: Set time period of nat refresh packets <1...60> seconds

helloInterval.description: Set time period of control hello packets <100..600000> milli seconds

helloTolerance.description: Set tolerance of control hello packets <12..6000> seconds

all.description: Allow all traffic. Overrides all other allow-service options if allow-service all is set

tcpMssAdjust.description: TCP MSS on SYN packets, in bytes

tlocExtension.description: Extends a local TLOC to a remote node only for vpn 0

if.$comment: when tunnelInterface on, encapsulation should be gt 1

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for [parcelType] profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
